pr_title: Issue #11028: Set the Secure attribute when SameSite=None

timeline.message: Issue #11028: Set the Secure attribute when SameSite=None
Issue #11028: Update FATs for SameSite=None; Secure

timeline.bodyText: do you foresee tracing files being an issue for this?
timeline.author: mrsaldana
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,17 +22,17 @@
                   host="*"
                   httpPort="${bvt.prop.HTTP_default}"
                   httpsPort="${bvt.prop.HTTP_default.secure}">
-    </httpEndpoint>
-  
-  	<!-- Automatically expand WAR files and EAR files -->
-  	<applicationManager autoExpand="true"/>
-  
-	<jspEngine keepGenerated="true"/>
+     </httpEndpoint>
 
-  	<logging
+    <!-- Automatically expand WAR files and EAR files -->
+    <applicationManager autoExpand="true"/>
+
+    <jspEngine keepGenerated="true"/>
+
+    <logging
         traceSpecification="*=info=enabled:com.ibm.ws.session.*=all:com.ibm.ws.webcontainer*=all:com.ibm.wsspi.webcontainer*=all:HttpTransport=all:HTTPChannel=all:TCPChannel=all:GenericBNF=all:com.ibm.ws.jsp*=all:com.ibm.ws.session.*=all:com.ibm.ws.runtime.update.internal*=all:ChannelFramework=all"
-    	maxFileSize="20"
-    	maxFiles="10"
-    	traceFormat="BASIC"/>
+        maxFileSize="100"
